channel.title: Changin Exp
channel.description: Ok how do I change the exp that happens when I hit an ogject like a dummy that adds the exp

item.title: Changin Exp
item.dc:creator: @pu123_5k1ll3 pu123 5k1ll3
item.description:
@pu123_5k1ll3 wrote:

you go into client.java and search for

if (objectID == 823)

then you should see addSkillXP((2000*playerLevel[0])

now where the 2000 is it may be different in yours. now edit that and it should change the experience you get per hit

for mine i have it grouped when u hit dummy it raises melee stats at the same time but you should look for the addSkillXP))2000*playerLevel[0]) and where it says playerLevel[0] look for playerLevel[1], playerLevel[2], and so on and just change them as you feel necessary

Read full topic
